comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Prince Fushimi Sadanaru (伏見宮貞愛親王 Fushimi-no-miya Sadanaru-Shinnō, June 9, 1858 – February 4, 1923) was the 22nd head of the Fushimi-no-miya shinnōke (branch of the Imperial Family), and a field marshal in the Imperial Japanese Army.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
trialsanderrors:

Thanks for the further information on General Prince Fushimi Sadanaru. We will add more details about him when we update this record.
